I'm getting nervous now every time I see a picture of a celebrity online.
@queevah I think I accidentally challenged the universe:/
@conoroneill15 Holy shit, I wasn't expecting to be proved right :/ this is getting really disturbing. Poor Star Wars fandom :(
George Michael yesterday. Liz Smith today - looks like 2016 is committing one murder per day till the year is over.

Wow, @Hozier did you know that your album is in @jk_rowling top three favourites of all time? I didn't, and the fact delights me.
Love the new site, @jk_rowling! It feels so much like your old one! Used to love unlocking things to find the name of the last HP book, etc.
Over two hours spent Christmas shopping, and I've so far bought four things for myself and nothing for anyone else #Xmas

What a suitably macabre ending to 2016 it would be if China invades Taiwan and started World War III. Please let's not tempt fate.

Currently watching #DeathNote on my study breaks, and while the story is very good, the galling amount of sexism is driving me insane!
Imagine a world without Google? My God, we'd all be lost. We would have to use - shudder - bing
Also, what's going on with Google? I thought it was just my house, but a few people have told me they can't get onto Google now #google
The internet is not my friend today.
Why is Sword Art Online no longer on Netflix?? Don't tell me it wasn't! Cause I saw it and planned to watch it later, and now I can't???
Why would any democratic state think that it has the right to decide whether certain books should be distributed in the country?
Only to find that the last book they targeted was banned as recently as March this year?! My fury bar is now full #censorship
Then I searched around and realised that they are still at this moment upholding a ban on 274 books and magazines?! My fury increased
So about ten minutes ago, I realised that the archaic Irish Censorship of Publications Board still exists, and I became annoyed, naturally.
@AoifKells yep, tell me about it 😂😭
Bishops warning against repealing the 8th amend.They need to stop trying to influence Irish politics.Their days of absolute control are over
So Russia helped elect Donald Trump to the presidency. And what is the White House going to do about that? Nothing, I expect.
@AoifKells yes please haha! Critical theory was my jam last year XD when I get home from work today I have to write a big essay 😭
"Researching" literary articles for my essays has become my newest method of procrastination. I'm so creative when it comes to not working.
#thoughtprovoking Sidonie Smith's old article on the self and the subject in the genre of autobiography (I know, I'm such a nerd).
It's funny how I used to really dislike critical theory, but now I'd happily soak it up all day rather than actually write my essay.
This would be just too perfect!! Now that the idea is in my head, I must see it happen! @jk_rowling @FantasticBeasts https://t.co/UZYCED6eV2
@sam_clemmett congrats! Can't wait to see it now next year! #excited
My self-inflicted incarceration to do my essays has made me emotionally stressed 😂😧💔
Shawn Mendes playing HP and the Prisoner of Azkaban on his snapchat story has literally melted my heart❤ I need a man who loves HP that much
@VirginMediaIE well done Daryll!! Knew you could do it.
@VirginMediaIE Poor Daryll, slaving away in the cold Virgin HQ to save our internet. Feels like the eyes of the nation are on him now.G.Luck
@HAFAELPUNK it's the worst possible time for it to happen! College essay will not be done now...
@traceywalker82 oh that's worse :/ all my hopes of getting my essay done tonight are draining away
@VirginMediaIE I really hope so! In dire need of a connection for my college essay tonight!
Apparently there's a Dublin-wide internet blackout for virgin media users. Whyyy now?? This is study week!!! 😭😭
There's a very entertaining 8 year old on this bus doing a fabulous impression of the Godfather. Everyone's in stitches #busbants
@_SomeDad yeah wasn't a first imprint. Still wouldn't say no to it though xD
Literally sick watching that child get the first edition Harry Potter 😭 #LateLateToyShow

The wonderful realisation that #LesMisérables functions perfectly as a sequel to #Hamilton. #musicals #fate
I had great intentions of rattling off a stream of intelligent tweets denouncing Trump, Farage and modern fascism. But hate makes me tired.
There's just something about Donald Trump and Nigel Farage that induces a desire to vomit. Symptoms get much worse when they start talking.
Funny how the people whose visages makes me violently ill upon a single glance are on TV every. single. day. Actually no, not funny at all.
Every time I type Donald Trump's name I keep accidentally writing Donald Duck. I only wish America was going to be led by a duck..
Or he just doesn't care. Probably both.
Donald Trump makes the extremely dangerous mistake of mixing up the words 'refugee' and 'immigrant'. He has no grasp of the English language
Is Donald Trump now the most hated leader in the world? Why yes, I think he is. And that's saying something, considering his competition.
Yes, Fianna Fáil, welcome back the man who destroyed our country's economy and reputation. People and parties don't change.
Whatever people may say about him, I love the fact that our President is a scholar, poet and human rights campaigner.
Think it's a disgrace that the Catholic Church rejected new gov curriculum to promote understanding of world religions in schools #church
